subtitle: Spiced fruits topped with zesty meringue topping.

method.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Lightly grease a 900 ml ovenproof dish.
Mix the apples in a bowl with the rhubarb and orange juice. Stir in the sugar, spices and coconut. Spoon into the ovenproof dish. Cover loosely with foil. Bake for 35 min.

To make the meringue: In a clean dry bowl, whisk the egg whites until they form soft peaks. Gradually whisk in the sugar, whisking well after each addition until the mixture is stiff and shiny. Add the lemon rind. Pile the meringue over the rhubarb mixture.
Bake for 10-15 min until the meringue is lightly brown and crisp on top. Serve immediately.

title: Rhubarb and apple meringue pudding
